title: Quick Check: An old photo of Prince Charles with Kanika Kapoor is being shared with a false narrative
subtitle: The photo was taken in 2015 when singer Kanika Kapoor attended the Elephant Family charity, 'Travels to my Elephant’, hosted by Prince Charles and Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A photo is being shared with the claim that Prince Charles has contracted with Coronavirus from Kanika Kapoor during the latter’s recent visit to the United Kingdom. FACTLY has found that the image was taken in 2015 when singer Kanika Kapoor attended the Elephant Family charity, ‘Travels to my Elephant’, hosted by Prince Charles and Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall. So, the image is an old one.

Did you watch our new video?
